This will unlock the following Codex Edition content :        

â€¢	The Da Vinci Disappearance DLC 

 Taking place after the events of the main campaign, Leonardo Da Vinci 
 has been kidnapped by the Hermeticists, an underground cult 
 dedicated to transforming mankind.  Now, it's up to Ezio to embark on 
 a relentless quest to recover stolen paintings in order to find his friend
 before it is too late, discovering two new locations and gameplay
 features along the way, including the legendary Helmschmied Drachen 
 Armor.  This DLC becomes accessible after Memory Sequence 3.             

â€¢	Exclusive Single Player Map: The Trajan Market

 This mission sends Ezio into a marketplace in the center of Rome, 
 where he will fight against guards of the evil Borgia family and 
 discover a treasure hidden in the ruins of an old tower.  This map is 
 found via the Templar door on the north side of the Mercanti di 
 Traiano.   

â€¢	Exclusive Single Player Map: The Aqueducts

 In this mission, Ezio discovers that the Templars are searching for a 
 secret  treasure, and Ezio must stop them in a race against time.  This
 map is enabled in the start of Memory Sequence 8.

 outift,  Altairâ€™s Armor, and Desmond Milesâ€™ outfit.
